Voice [/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|” module_class=”box-img-section” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_end=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg”][et_pb_row module_class=”box-img-left” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/woman-sing.png” background_size=”contain” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”20px||20px|” animation_style=”fade” column_structure=”2_5,3_5″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ module_class=”overlay-text” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Your Voice” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]

Your Voice

In today’s world of YouTube stars and a plethora of music talent shows and competitions, it’s easy to think that all you need to succeed in the music industry is talent and charisma — NOT TRUE!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Learn More” module_class=”bg-blue” _builder_version=”4.4.8″ animation_style=”zoom” hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”||on” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_end=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/IMG-GRL5.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_color=”rgba(51,51,51,0.8)” background_size=”contain” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px|” custom_padding=”70px|20px|70px|20px” animation_style=”fade” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Your Voice” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]

Your Voice

In today’s world of YouTube stars and a plethora of music talent shows and competitions, it’s easy to think that all you need to succeed in the music industry is talent and charisma — NOT TRUE!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Learn More” module_class=”bg-blue” _builder_version=”4.4.8″ animation_style=”zoom” hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”more-info” module_class=”full-screen” _builder_version=”4.4.8″ background_color=”#333333″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/microphone-bg.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” disabled=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” column_structure=”2_5,3_5″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Nick-Cooper.jpg” alt=”Nick Cooper” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”img-gray” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”flip” animation_delay=”250ms”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Nick Cooper” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_2_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_delay=”500ms”]

Nick Cooper

You must [also] be dedicated, focused, educated, and well-connected. At Vocal Star, we’ll help you do just that. With our music talent agency, you will develop your voice and style, connect with iconic Pop Stars, and receive vocal training from some of the best vocalists and top vocal coaches in the world, including Nick Cooper and others.

Anyone who works with Nick, including celebrity clients such as Beyonce, Nicki Minaj, Mary Mary, Katy Perry, and Jason Derulo, know that his ultimate goal is to unlock the hidden potential from within. From Korea to Norway, Australia to Japan, he strives to bring peace and vocal balance to each vocalist he encounters. Many say that his approach to vocal training creates change from the inside out, that reaches far beyond vocal freedom. You will walk away with a greater understanding of your creative purpose and a clear intention of how you aim to change the world through your gift!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/audition-form/” button_text=”Sign Up For Our Vocal Auditions Today!” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”bg-pink” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”700ms”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
